trans-unit.target:
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_SEQ_00<tab>The Wake doctor is not one to be kept waiting.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_SEQ_01<tab>As thanks for thwarting Papa Gruff's scheme, the Wake doctor would invite you somewhere special. She bids you speak with the unusual usher beside her should you wish to discover her surprise.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_SEQ_02<tab>You follow the usher to an eerie and wholly unfamiliar place. Perhaps the Wake doctor is somewhere close by to explain where you are and the surprise she has in store.

TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_SEQ_03<tab>Her guise as the Wake doctor cast aside once more, the pumpkin-headed apparition has revealed that this mysterious place─the very surprise she had in store for you─is, in fact, her home. Unsettling though her residence may be, she has nonetheless graciously invited you to stay for as long as you like. Perhaps she would be willing to tell you more about herself, should you choose to stick around.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the unusual usher.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the pumpkin-headed apparition.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_001<tab>So, you remembered my request. I am pleased.

TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_002<tab>As I mentioned earlier, there is somewhere I would like to take you, though I'm afraid it is a place not easily reached. When you're ready to depart, pray speak with the usher here, and he will escort you.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_003<tab>If you are expecting me to reveal the surprise to you here and now, you are sorely mistaken. Go, speak with the usher.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_MYSTERIOUSGUIDE04656_000_010<tab>Ah, you must be the guest of honor. If it please you, I shall escort you immediately.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_Q0_000_000<tab>Allow the unusual usher to escort you?
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_100_011<tab>I shall take my leave first, and make the preparations necessary to receive you. Do not be alarmed by what you see, child...heh heh heh...
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_MYSTERIOUSGUIDE04656_000_011<tab>We shall not be far behind! Now, if you would follow me.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_MYSTERIOUSGUIDE04656_000_012<tab>My, did you get lost along the way? No matter, I would be happy to escort you again.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_020<tab>Welcome to my humble abode.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_021<tab>Surprised to see I have a home of my own, are you? Even the Great Gourd needs a place to rest her head.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_022<tab>I have never invited a mortal to my home before. Consider this my show of thanks for ensuring All Saints' Wake could be celebrated this year unimpeded.

TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_023<tab>I have never invited a mortal to my home before. Consider this my way of thanking you for ensuring All Saints' Wake could be celebrated year after year unimpeded.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_024<tab>You may make yourself at home, and stay as long as you like.
TEXT_FESHLW802_04656_PUMPKIN_000_025<tab>If you are concerned about Papa Gruff, do not be. He and I have come to an understanding. Some children must simply learn the hard way...heh heh heh...
